Articles.Content: Anybody know how to delete parts on xbox? When i remove parts form a craft on my xbox i have to just set them aside instead of deleting them, it gets messy and unorganized.

Try dragging it to the parts list on the left and just dropping it there. I do that on PC even because I don't have to take my hand off the mouse to hit the delete key.

Edited January 3, 2019 by 5thHorseman
I do know my left from my right.
Yes, on the console you delete parts off a craft by dropping them back in the parts bin.
